snippet: West Bromwich Albion's takeover by Chinese investment group Yunyi Guokai (Shanghai) Sports Development Ltd has been completed, the Premier League club said in a statement on Thursday....

headline.main: Chinese Group Completes West Brom Takeover
headline.print_headline: Chinese Group Completes West Brom Takeover

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion's takeover by Chinese investment group Yunyi Guokai (Shanghai) Sports Development Ltd has been completed, the Premier League club said in a statement on Thursday.

snippet: West Ham United striker Andy Carroll is fit to face Southampton in the Premier League on Saturday after recovering from the hamstring injury he suffered against Bournemouth last month, but new signing Sam Byram has been ruled out for a week....

headline.main: West Ham's Carroll Fit for Southampton, Byram Ruled Out
headline.print_headline: West Ham's Carroll Fit for Southampton, Byram Ruled Out

lead_paragraph: West Ham United striker Andy Carroll is fit to face Southampton in the Premier League on Saturday after recovering from the hamstring injury he suffered against Bournemouth last month, but new signing Sam Byram has been ruled out for a week.

snippet: Southampton have completed the signing of striker Charlie Austin from Queens Park Rangers, the Premier League club said on their website on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Southampton have completed the signing of striker Charlie Austin from Queens Park Rangers, the Premier League club said on their website on Saturday.

snippet: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce admitted he would be taking a "calculated risk" when he signs Senegalese Dame N'Doye who has not scored for Turkish club Trabzonspor this season....

headline.main: N'Doye a 'Calculated Risk' for Sunderland, Says Allardyce
headline.print_headline: N'Doye a 'Calculated Risk' for Sunderland, Says Allardyce

lead_paragraph: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce admitted he would be taking a "calculated risk" when he signs Senegalese Dame N'Doye who has not scored for Turkish club Trabzonspor this season.

snippet: Southampton manager Claude Puel is confident Fraser Forster has the qualities to handle the pressure of being England goalkeeper should he get the chance to enjoy a run in the side....

headline.main: Forster Would Cope With England Challenge, Says Puel
headline.print_headline: Forster Would Cope With England Challenge, Says Puel

lead_paragraph: Southampton manager Claude Puel is confident Fraser Forster has the qualities to handle the pressure of being England goalkeeper should he get the chance to enjoy a run in the side.

snippet: The city of Leicester wasn't just toasting its soccer team on Monday: One of its natives won the snooker World Championship on the same night....

headline.main: Leicester Toasts World Snooker Champion Selby
headline.print_headline: Leicester Toasts World Snooker Champion Selby

lead_paragraph: The city of Leicester wasn't just toasting its soccer team on Monday: One of its natives won the snooker World Championship on the same night.

snippet: West Bromwich Albion manager Tony Pulis will hold talks about his future with chairman Jeremy Peace at the end of the season despite having 18 months left on his contract....

headline.main: Pulis to Discuss West Brom Future at End of Season
headline.print_headline: Pulis to Discuss West Brom Future at End of Season

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion manager Tony Pulis will hold talks about his future with chairman Jeremy Peace at the end of the season despite having 18 months left on his contract.

snippet: Manchester United's Zlatan Ibrahimovic has apologised to fans after picking up his fifth yellow card of the season against Swansea City in the Premier League on Sunday, which rules him out of their next game against Arsenal....

headline.main: Ibrahimovic Apologises to United Fans for Arsenal Suspension
headline.print_headline: Ibrahimovic Apologises to United Fans for Arsenal Suspension

lead_paragraph: Manchester United's Zlatan Ibrahimovic has apologised to fans after picking up his fifth yellow card of the season against Swansea City in the Premier League on Sunday, which rules him out of their next game against Arsenal.

snippet: A fine first half garnished by goals from Santi Cazorla, Alexis Sanchez and Mesut Ozil gave Arsenal a 3-1 win at Watford for their first Premier League victory of the season, easing the pressure on long-serving manager Arsene Wenger on Saturday....

headline.main: Arsenal Beat Watford 3-1 to Ease Pressure on Wenger
headline.print_headline: Arsenal Beat Watford 3-1 to Ease Pressure on Wenger

lead_paragraph: A fine first half garnished by goals from Santi Cazorla, Alexis Sanchez and Mesut Ozil gave Arsenal a 3-1 win at Watford for their first Premier League victory of the season, easing the pressure on long-serving manager Arsene Wenger on Saturday.

snippet: Middlesbrough have signed the United States goalkeeper Brad Guzan, the newly promoted Premier League club announced on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Middlesbrough have signed the United States goalkeeper Brad Guzan, the newly promoted Premier League club announced on Friday.
